about_the_game:
Do you want to relax this evening? Our spicy stories are already waiting for you, go ahead.

🍓 5 visual novels for every taste

🔥 27 full-length voice-over animations and a 100+ unique sexy artworks

❤️ Match-3 levels (I know you love it) with endless moves for the most relaxed ones

⚡️ Dozens of achievements - collect them all!

Who knows where your choices will lead you, or which steamy sex scenes await you along your journey!

The path of an aspiring actor is anything but easy. Charlie knows this discouraging truth like no one else. He’s only got one chance to show what he's made of and ace the audition. And his two obscenely sexy flatmates, Beatrice and Anabel, are ready to lend a hand, or two, in whipping him into tip-top shape! Whether their venture ends with Charlie’s triumph or an impromptu threesome, you're getting a front row seat to this new action-packed novella, “Behind the Scenes!"

Mia's independent life did not work out from the very beginning… Rent debts, a failed art academy exam, and a frighteningly hazy future.

Everything was changed by a call from a bestie with a very tempting offer to start doing 18+ streams online. Seemed like easy money, what could go wrong? But... What if someone else finds out about her part-time job? Someone like a cute boy who lives next door? And who is this mysterious fan who doesn't miss a single Mia's stream?

Everyone at the university knows that Yumi is a role model. Rich parents, perfect grades and an impeccable reputation. But who knows what is really hiding under the mask of a diligent student?The new arrival to the faculty, Marco, flunks Yumi on the exam, and all her usual approaches to changing the professor's mind fail. It seems that Marco's is going to make a really good girl out of her!

Kevin has just returned to his hometown for the holidays. What is waiting for him here? A hot summer, parties with hot chicks... and an unexpected meeting with his best friend's mom?! It seems that she doesn't mind teaching Kevin all the basics of sex and the forbidden dreams of his youth are about to come true!

Larry just got promoted at the head office of a famous sex toy company! If only his new boss Ada wasn't such a pain in his ass... The petite "office devil," as the employees love to call her, seems to get off on ruining, not only Larry's day, but his life as well! Or perhaps her panties are drenched merely at the sight of him for a completely different reason...

content_descriptors.notes:
All participants are of legal age and express their consent. 
It contains sexual acts, nudity, scenes of BDSM, sex with foreign objects, group sex.

name: Hentai Stories

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB+
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: 🔥Thirsty for spicy adventures? Hentai Stories is already here! Try our 5 juicy stories with branching paths, match-3 challenges and 27 voiced animated sex-scenes! Unveil the secret desires of the hot college coed, the dominant lady boss, or even your best friend's mom!🔥
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
